body.name: Laundry Sauce - Luxury Scented Laundry Detergent Pods & Scent Booster Bundle (Egyptian Rose), Premium Laundry Washing Pods with High-End, Sophisticated Fragrances - Dye Free & HE Compatible
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 6 hrs 51 mins
features: Smell Like Pure Luxury: Depart from the mundane and indulge yourself in luxury with Laundry Sauce’s Laundry Detergent Pods & Scent Booster Bundle. For those bold individuals that want to control their destiny, we combined an ultra-concentrated performance laundry detergent formula, and our advanced luxury in-wash scent booster, with high-end sophisticated natural fragrances for an irresistible clean. Includes one box of 69 laundry detergent pods and one 11oz cylinder of scent booster.

Egyptian Rose: A seductive heart of exotic rose brought to life with warm nutmeg and clove spice. Honeyed hawthorn adds texture to a fresh and clean woods signature of Haitian vetiver and warm cedarwood. Creamy bourbon vanilla blended with a bed of soft white musk adds an addictive thread of velvety comfort.

Small Package Big Results: Our oversized, ultra-concentrated 22ml performance laundry detergent pods get the job done right the first time. These powerful pods pack a punch to ensure your clothes are clean, free of stains like red wine, grass, oils and more. Plus, our formula is free of dyes and compatible with all washing machines, including HE machines. Just toss the pod into the drum and your laundry will be looking good and smelling irresistible in no time.

Scent Booster: Give your wash load a fragrance boost with our advanced luxury in-wash scent booster formulated with high-end sophisticated natural fragrances. Safe for all colors, fabrics and washing machines, these tiny scent beads dissolve in all water temperatures to give your clothes a lasting smell of pure luxury. It’s simple – just shake your desired amount into the washing drum, add clothes, start the wash cycle, and let Laundry Sauce do its thing!

Elevate the Everyday: When you smell your best, look your best, and feel your best, you're ready to take on the rest. At Laundry Sauce, we elevate your everyday essentials so you can rise above the ordinary and be extraordinary. We are the hype for your hamper, the luxury for your laundry day, the extra touch for your towels, the secret sauce for a better wash. Why? Because you're worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! These are beyond amazing! I am hooked for life!
reviews.reviewText: Wow! I am beyond amazed at these laundry products! I was hesitant to buy them because of the cost but I really love having my clothing / bedding / linens smell nice and never get a good scent with grocery store products.I bought the Australian Sandalwood scent in pods and scent booster. It is an AMAZING fragrance that is hard to explain but I could smell it all day and be in heaven. As soon as I got them, I immediately did a load of a sheet, two pillowcases and some clothing. You can smell the scent as soon as you open the packages. I added a pod and a bit of the scent booster to the load and washed them. When I took them out I was so happy that they totally smelled of the Australian Sandalwood scent. It was strong but not too strong. Do NOT believe others on here that say there is not much / any scent. I don't know what they are doing but that is not the case at all. Even after drying I could really smell the scent on all of my laundry.I put the sheet and pillowcase on my bed and immediately wanted to get into it and snuggle. It is just such a great smell and it lasts for a long time. I use it for all of my clothes, towels, bath rugs and bedding. I can't help it - I just want everything to smell like it.My clothes came out super clean and super soft, even without using any laundry sheets. I didn't want to ruin the scent so I skipped my usual dryer sheets. I actually ended up going to their website and buying the matching dryer sheets and softener. I wish Amazon offered the entire line of products as they are slightly cheaper on Amazon and the shipping is overnight compared to about 5 or 6 days from the company website.I also washed my 16 year old son's bedding and clothing in LS and even HE loves the scent. Now he asks me, as I am collecting his laundry, "mom you are using that special stuff on it right?".. I was so surprised that a teenager boy would care about this.I will never be able to use anything else now. This would make an amazing gift for that "impossible to buy for" person. I highly recommend. Try it, you won't be sorry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious Laundry Sauce
reviews.reviewText: Wow! Well first off, the packaging and presentation is gorgeous and modern. Unlike you typical jug or plastic tub of pods, this looks fancy sitting on my laundry room shelf. The pods in the black box look like golden jewels of amber. And the scent even when I’m not washing clothes makes my laundry room smell so good. Ok, on to the scent. I picked Australian Sandalwood. I was unsure what to expect, but to my surprise it smells amazing! It’s a scent unlike any other. It is slightly more of a manly scent, but not overpowering and still has a bit of a clean soapy smell to it. You can definitely pick up every bit of the scent profile that is listed for Australian Sandalwood. Onto the wash. First load I did with the Laundry Sauce was some throw blankets. I used one pod, a small sprinkle of LS scent booster beads, and about 4-5 throw blankets in my top loader. As the wash began the aroma of Australian Sandalwood wafted thru the air. When the cycle was complete, I took the clothes from the wash and put in the dryer. Omg, they smelled good and looked very clean. Started up the dryer and the scent went thru my entire downstairs. And on my patio where the dryer vent is smelled amazing and I am sure that lovely smell drifted thru the neighborhood. When throw blanket were dry I took them out and you could totally smell the Laundry Sauce. So, don’t believe the other reviews when they say there is no scent left after drying or very little. They must be those that dump all kinds of scented softener and half a jar of scent needs in a normal load and end up smelling like they took a bath in it. Ever have those people at work that walk by you smelling so strongly of scent booster? Yeah, nobody needs to be smelling that strong. Well LS still leaves a powerful scent on your laundry but yet not overwhelming to where it makes you smell like you used scent boosters as a body wash. 2 weeks after washing the throw blankets that are used almost daily I can still smell the LS on them. Even washed my dogs dirty stinky blankets and they still smell clean. This scent is unlike no other and definitely smells classy and rich. Yes it’s expensive but if you want something different that works well at getting your clothes clean, this is it! I won’t use it on my everyday loads of wash, but definitely on any blankets, bedding, bath towels, and some of my nicer clothing items. I have a son soon to go off to college and I plan on buying his the pods and booster to take with him so he can smell great everyday. Even if his clothes don’t get washed very often like the typical college student. I was highly impressed by LS. I do wish they also made dryer sheets that would come with the bundle. I was worried about using my typical Bounce dryer sheet after washing a load with LS, never know if the scents might mix and smell bad,but it didn’t effect it at all. The Australian Sandalwood was the scent that stuck to it. This bundle would make a great gift for someone who likes bougie things and is hard to buy for. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells amazing, packaged beautifully.
reviews.reviewText: I loved the packaging and how well it was packaged! It's beautiful and sustainable. It's like opening a treasure trust full of delightful smells. The scent is perfection. I ordered the rose scent and it was light and flowery with none of the synthetic smells that you get from cheaper products. It smelled like a bouquet of roses. I used one laundry pod per load of laundry and my clothes came out clean and delicately scented. The smell lingered for days but it was not an overpowering odor. I used the in wash scent booster on a load of small rugs and my house smelled beautiful for over a week. Again, the scent was not overwhelming. I am excited to try the other scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I Really Just Want the Scent Booster
reviews.reviewText: I guess these work in terms of cleaning power. No real added scent using the pods only. I’ve even tried to throw three pods in there just to see. I’m allergic to Tide, so these pods have not made me break out. I love the scent booster. The Egyptian Rose scent is amazing. I’ve only been using a little of the scent booster and I’ve already ran out. Wish I could buy it separately. This is pretty pricey. Probably won’t be purchasing again. Great scent booster beads though. Again, that joy was short-lived.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells GREAT but expensive!
reviews.reviewText: We bought the starter pack that comes with the Australian Sandalwood pods and scent beads. Is the scent noticeable? Yes. But we found that we had to use two pods or else the scent was really minimal.It’s definitely a luxury purchase. You’re not buying this to save money. To make it last longer, we decided to just use the pods on sheets and towels from now on.I’d like to try out some of the other scents, but I’m scared I won’t like one and be stuck with the entire box of pods and beads. I wish there was some sort of 5pack sample.
